be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti
Class ItemSet

java.lang.Object
  be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.ItemSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
WeightedItemSet
public class ItemSet
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds an ordered set of items. An item is defined as a learning/test set element.

This class holds functions for finding the best test splitting the set in subsets, i.e. the test bringing most information. The information of a test T splitting a set S is two subsets S1 and S2 is H(S) - H(S1) |S1| / |S| - H(S2) |S2| / |S| where |X| denotes the size of the set X. This value is called "score" below.

This class does not handles weights associated to items; they are simply ignored. The specific class WeightedItemSet handles weights and unknown attribute values.

nbItems

public int nbItems()
Returns the sum of this set's items weights. (This can be see as the size of this set if items are partially counted according to their weight.)

Returns:
The sum of this set's items weights.

size

public double size()
Returns this set's number of items. Can safely be casted to a int.

Returns:
A (positive) number of items.

bestSplitTest

public TestScore bestSplitTest(AttributeSet candidateAttributes,
                               SymbolicAttribute goalAttribute)
Finds the test on one attribute performing the best split (bringing the most information) for finding the value of a goal attribute.

Parameters:
candidateAttributes - The set of attributes defining which attributes can be tested.
goalAttribute - The attribute to guess using the test.
Returns:
The best test for finding goal and the associated score.

bestSplitTests

public TestScore[] bestSplitTests(AttributeSet candidateAttributes,
                                  SymbolicAttribute goalAttribute)
Finds the test on each attribute performing the best split (bringing the most information) for finding the value of a goal attribute.

Parameters:
candidateAttributes - The set of attributes defining which attributes can be tested.
goalAttribute - The attribute to guess using the test.
Returns:
The best tests (and the associated scores) for finding goal. The i-th element of the array matches the i-th candidate attribute.

split

public ItemSet[] split(Test test)
Splits the set according to a test.

Parameters:
test - A test on an attribute of this set's items.
Returns:
The resulting sets split by the test. The i-th element of the array matches the i-th issue of the test.
